> I would suggest sending SI=

itrix is hung up on (i.e. '% kill -SIGQUIT
> LAUNCHER_PID').  Send it to th=
e list if you'd like.
>

ease notes if you're

Yo=
u are right, sending SIGQUIT would have been good idea ;-)
After fiddling a=
round, I have decided to restart Heritrix and try to recover 
the crawl (lo=
ading a 800M recover.gz takes a lot of time).

I think my problem is not re=
lated to the NPTL bug you mentioned; the server 
already has glibc 2.3.3, b=
ut who knows...
